page.title: 16Farming 2
page.content: Several different animals are kept at{Manor Farm.}There are 65 pigs who at present have 39 piglets. They are kept in styes outside. Twentytwo cattle are kept for their meat but there is no longer a milking herd of cows. There are a few sheep and four horses. Several kinds of birds are kept for their eggs. There are twelve hens, twelve ducks, ten geese with five goslings and four guinea fowl. Most of these can roam freely round the farm. Three dogs help the farmer and there are also the farm cats.
